ValidationRule.description: Checks to see if certain cases that require approval have been approved prior to an attempt to close the case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsClosed = TRUE, Approved__c = FALSE, ( OR( Secondary_Category__c = "EDW Mapping Maintenance", Secondary_Category__c = "Cost Center Create", Secondary_Category__c = "GL Account Create" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case must be submitted for approval to close.
